masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "I pulled over a modified street racer for a broken taillight and there's a HONEY BADGER behind the wheel. Trilby hat, licking his paws 'for grip.' Says he's 'driving for the bees.' I don't know what that means but he just peeled out."
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Catch Slick before he disappears into the city
  • Find out what 'driving for the bees' means
  • He's fastâ€”you'll need speed or strategy
